abstract: A former SS general, an ex-SS official and his former secretary were given prison sentences, while the spectators in the courtroom were urging the judge to require them to be hanged instead.
lead_paragraph: MUNICH — Former SS Gen. Wilhelm Harster, 62, was sentenced to 15 years’ jail today for his part in the mass murder of Dutch Jews, including Anne Frank.
snippet: A former SS general, an ex-SS official and his former secretary were given prison sentences, while the spectators in the courtroom were urging the judge to require them to be hanged instead....
